title: Log
description: Log model for tracking changes to entities

entityType.description: Type of entity that was changed (e.g., 'Car', 'User')

entityId.description: ID of the entity that was changed

action.description: Type of action performed (create, update, delete)

userId.description: ID of the user who made the change

randomCarId.description: Reference to a random car (for testing or logging purposes)

oldValues.description: Previous values before the change (stored as JSON)

newValues.description: New values after the change (stored as JSON)

changes.description: Diff of changed fields (stored as JSON)

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the change (stored as JSON)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created
